metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15358 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In SQLite before 3.32.3, select.c mishandles query-flattener optimization,leading to a multiSelectOrderBy heap overflow because of misuse oftransitive properties for constant propagation.

criterions.comment: sqlite: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
sqlite3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
